channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 12:43 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Nikopol city and Nikopol territorial community- Chervonohryhoriv territorial community
item.description: 游리 12:43 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Nikopol city and Nikopol territorial community- Chervonohryhoriv territorial community#Dnipropetrovsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 12:42 Alarm lifted in Zaporizhia region. Stay tuned for further updates.
item.description: 游릭 12:42 Alarm lifted in Zaporizhia region. Stay tuned for further updates. #Zaporizhia_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 12:35 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 12:35 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 12:29 The threat of artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community has been eliminated. Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
